page.title: 16Colby C.P. School
page.content: Our school is called{Colby C.P School. Our age range is from{5}to{11.Not many people live in the village of Colby. That is why most of us go to school by bus, a few of us come by car,bike or walking. We have 4 classes and 4 teacher's. We go swimming on Fridays at 10.30 till 11.30.We play game's like cricket,rounders,netball and hockey. There are 90 children in our school and about 25 in each class.Our school was built in 1880.We have 2 computers and a printer and 2 televisions and a video.Every year in the Summer term we have our SPORTS DAY in which we all race against each other.We have different team's they are RED,GREEN, YELLOW and BLUE.We also have area sport's and a swimming gala.When we leave this school most of us go to Aylsham High.
